means: 周日夜晚（指周末休息日以外的每个夜晚）

sentence.Network_en: Howard : So I can never stay up past ten a weeknight now?
sentence.Network_cn: 霍华: 所以从现在起,星期一到星期五我再也不能超过十点才睡?

PerfectNetExp.abs: Bourne ... shrink 心理医生; weeknight 平日晚; comedy 讲笑话的(谐星).
Eating out. ... dressing 沙拉酱 weeknight 周间的晚上 delicious 美味的.

list.abs: whether a formal dinner or a weeknight supper , these placemats lend any mood or theme to mealtimes .无论是正餐还是周末晚餐，这些数码餐垫都能带来惊喜或用餐时的话题。

she , like Chua , packed our violins in the trunk of the minivan so we could practice even while we were on vacation and forbade sleepovers and weeknight television well into my high school years .她就像蔡妈妈一样，把小提琴塞入汽车的行李箱，这样我们即便在度假也可以练习小提琴，而且当我进入高中时，她也适当地禁止我

encyclopedia.content: 指周末休息日以外的每个夜晚，是平日的夜晚，周一到周五的夜晚。week是一周，一星期的意思，虽然可以翻译为周日夜晚，但容易误解。表达周末的话最好用weekend。

entry.def: A weeknight is the evening or night of a weekday.

example.tran: 在工作日夜晚播出的时长半小时的节目

means.word_mean: 1. any night of the week except Saturday or Sunday

auth_sentence.content: It is striking just how old the implements and inventions are that go into the average weeknight supper.
